channel.title: Ceasar on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen
channel.description: Recent content in Ceasar on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen

item.title: A Ceasar cipher implemented in Vue.js
item.description: Related to my recent interest in CTF, I’ve spent a little time to implement a simple Ceasar cipher in Vue.js. It allows the user to replace letters with another letter some adjustable number of positions up or down the alphabet. I did this partly because it’s a long time since I’ve done any Vue-related work and also because I find other online Ceasar cipher sites to be a bit clunky and not as user friendly.
